== Commanding officers ==
Fairly high turnover of COs for this unit due to casualties in the Middle East. Marlan was captured, Olge wounded in action (mine) - medevac to Australia, Magno died of wounds. [[User:Anotherclown|Anotherclown]] ([[User talk:Anotherclown|talk]]) 07:12, 28 May 2016 (UTC) :{{reply to|Anotherclown}} G'day, mate, thanks for this. If you have any refs for Olge and Magno, would you mind adding them? I'm a bit sparse on the reference material for this one and those would be good additions. Cheers, [[User:AustralianRupert|AustralianRupert]] ([[User talk:AustralianRupert|talk]]) 09:09, 29 May 2016 (UTC) :: Howdy, sorry I don't have much time at the moment for this. The only additional refs I have are the timelines for their respective AWM entries - [https://www.awm.gov.au/people/P10679955/#timeline][https://www.awm.gov.au/people/P10680588/#timeline]. I hope that helps a little. All the best. [[User:Anotherclown|Anotherclown]] ([[User talk:Anotherclown|talk]]) 04:24, 30 May 2016 (UTC) :::I spoke too soon - found a bit in Maughan and added it. Pls reword however you see fit. [[User:Anotherclown|Anotherclown]] ([[User talk:Anotherclown|talk]]) 10:07, 30 May 2016 (UTC)
